name: Hot Mess (itch)
description:
After being turned into a candle by an evil witch, you must fight the other villagers who also suffered the same fate. However, you must use you own flesh and blood witch has been turned into wax to defeat them and collect their remains to heal yourself. Do you have what it takes to survive?
